scarface: now as i walk into the studio to do this with jig i got a phone call from one of my nigs said my homeboy reek he just lost one of his kids and when i heard that i just broke into tears and see in the second hand; you dont really know how this is but when it hits that close to home you feel the pain at the crib so i called mine and saddened my wife with the bad news now we both depressed countin our blessings cause brads two prayin for young souls to laugh at life through the stars lovin your kids just like you was ours and im hurtin for you dog; but aint nobody pain is like yours i just know that heavenll open these doors and aint no bright side to losin life; but you can view it like this gods got open hands homey he in the midst.. of good company who loves all and hates not one and one day you gon be wit your son i couldve rapped about my hard times on this song but heaven knows i woulda been wrong i wouldnta been right it wouldnta been love it wouldnta been life it wouldnta been us this cant be life
